FESI.awtgui
Class AwtConsole.TextAreaOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.OutputStream
        |
        +--FESI.awtgui.AwtConsole.TextAreaOutputStream
public class AwtConsole.TextAreaOutputStream
extends java.io.OutputStream

The final output stream that send the output to the associated TextArea. The output is *appended* to the text in the TextArea, because it will only be used like a console output.

Constructor Summary
AwtConsole.TextAreaOutputStream(java.awt.TextArea textArea)
          Connect the stream to a TextArea.
 
Method Summary
 void flush()
          Add the contents in the internal buffer to the TextArea and delete the buffer.

          Write to the internal buffer.
